TopicTitle: My screen goes black when i try to launch a vehicle?

Articles.Content: When i build a ship in KSP and i want to test/use it. I try to launch the ship, but about 5 sec after i spawn on the runway, the screen goes black but i can see all of my tools/monitors? Heres a Screenshot of it: https://gyazo.com/21ca3e3f231b89ad020b9613742a6324 Please help!

Though a screenshot is often useful for reporting issues, in the case of a black screen, it's not going to help a lot

I suggest you read this thread and provide the information mentioned (especially logs and modlist): then it will be a lot easier to determine the cause of your bug.

Edited December 16, 2015 by Gaarst
